ComicInfo.Summary:
Get set for Hot Habanero Action and Sexy Salsa Sizzle as our favorite Undead Vixen goes south of the border just in time for a Día de Muertos themed Halloween special! When a troubled young girl visits her sister’s grave on All Souls Day, could she rise from the ground and come to her sister’s aid? That we don’t know. But what we do know is that someone does hear her. Someone that does rise from graves. That someone is Janey Belle, The ZOMBIE TRAMP.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Marcelo Trom | 1 | Var | Risque Cover, Limited to 2500 | Marcelo Trom | 2 | Var | Limited Edition Cover, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 3 | Var | Limited Edition Cover, Limited to 1500 | Bill McKay | 4 | Var | Limited Edition Risque Cover, Limited to 1500 | Bill McKay | 5 | RE | New York Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Dan Mendoza | 6 | RE | ComicXposure Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 500 | ? | 7 | Notes:
The digital edition (10/7/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.The ComicXposure Exclusive Variant cover is a homage of the covers Fangoria magazines.
